mapper.select:
SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID, B.REP_ROUT_NM, A.DAY_DIV, A.WAY_DIV, A.ST_STTN_ID, (SELECT STTN_NM FROM BMS_STTN_MST WHERE STTN_ID = A.ST_STTN_ID AND DEL_YN!='Y') ST_STTN_NM, (SELECT STTN_ENM FROM BMS_STTN_MST WHERE STTN_ID = A.ST_STTN_ID AND DEL_YN!='Y') ST_STTN_ENM, A.ED_STTN_ID, (SELECT STTN_NM FROM BMS_STTN_MST WHERE STTN_ID = A.ED_STTN_ID AND DEL_YN!='Y') ED_STTN_NM, (SELECT STTN_ENM FROM BMS_STTN_MST WHERE STTN_ID = A.ED_STTN_ID AND DEL_YN!='Y') ED_STTN_ENM, A.OPER_CNT, A.ALLOC_CNT, A.FST_TM, A.LST_TM, A.AM_PEAK_ST_TM, A.AM_PEAK_ED_TM, A.PM_PEAK_ST_TM, A.PM_PEAK_ED_TM, A.AM_PEAK, A.PM_PEAK, A.NONE_PEAK, A.REMARK FROM BRT_OPER_PL_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID
AND (A.REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || B.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND A.REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND B.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY B.REP_ROUT_NM, A.DAY_DIV, A.WAY_DIV
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BRT_OPER_PL_MST WHERE REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID} AND DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} AND WAY_DIV = #{WAY_DIV}
mapper.select: SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID, A.DAY_DIV, A.WAY_DIV, A.OPER_SN, A.OPER_SN AS OLD_OPER_SN, A.ROUT_ID, A.ROUT_ST_TM, A.ROUT_ED_TM FROM BRT_OPER_PL_ROUT_INFO A WHERE A.REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID} AND A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} AND A.WAY_DIV = #{WAY_DIV}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BRT_OPER_PL_ROUT_INFO( REP_ROUT_ID,DAY_DIV,WAY_DIV,ROUT_ID,OPER_SN,ROUT_ST_TM,ROUT_ED_TM,UPD_DTM,UPD_ID ) VALUES( #{REP_ROUT_ID},#{DAY_DIV},#{WAY_DIV},#{ROUT_ID},#{OPER_SN},#{ROUT_ST_TM},#{ROUT_ED_TM},#{UPD_DTM},#{SSN_USER_ID} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ROUT_ST_TM = VALUES(ROUT_ST_TM) , ROUT_ED_TM = VALUES(ROUT_ED_TM) , UPD_DTM = VALUES(UPD_DTM) , UPD_ID = VALUES(UPD_ID);
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BRT_OPER_PL_ROUT_INFO WHERE REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID} AND DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} AND WAY_DIV = #{WAY_DIV} AND OPER_SN = #{OLD_OPER_SN}
